item.title: A Milestone for a Major International Alliance and an Olympic Music Controversy
item.description:
NATO, the alliance formed to protect Europe from the Soviet Union is marking 75 years. It the focus is still on Russia.

And a controversy in France over a singer selected to perform at the opening ceremony of the Olympics, raises questions about French identity.

item.title: Judge rules Trump's Mar-a-Lago classified documents case can proceed
item.description: The former president's lawyers cited the Presidential Records Act in asking that the government's case be dismissed. Judge Aileen Cannon denied the motion — clearing the way for it to proceed.
